body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Patrick Gonzales and the customer's name is Amanda Roberts.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Patrick Gonzales, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Patrick, I'm Amanda Roberts. I'm looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amanda! I would be happy to help you with that. Is there a specific model you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have my eye on one, but I want to know more about pricing and financing options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I can provide you with that information. Before we dive into details, may I have your phone number, please? Just to ensure I can reach you if needed.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s two zero three, six five four, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amanda! And could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks! Now about the motorcycles, we have some exciting financing options available depending on your budget.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds good! I’d love to hear more about those options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! I can send you all the details via email. Thank you so much for your time today, Amanda. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out!
